original_title: Vivaldi: Four Seasons in Nature's Harmony
overview: A stunning view to four seasons in picturesque archipelago of Finland together with Vivaldi masterpieces.  . Concerto in E major, Op. 8/1, RV 269 Spring  . Concerto in G minor, Op. 8/2, RV 315 Summer . Concerto in F major, Op. 8/3, RV 293 Autumn . Concerto in F minor, Op. 8/4, RV 297 Winter
title: Vivaldi: Four Seasons in Nature's Harmony
